name: The Head
description:
The Head is a relaxing platform game that has a lively world full of personalities to explore. As you play, you will getting to know this allegorical world better and little by little absorbs the messages that history wants to pass on to you.

The Story:

A very mysterious Head lives alone in the dangerous Deep Caves, far from all civilization, until Seraphine, a very determined young woman, manages to penetrate in the dreaded caves to find him, taking him on an adventure full of discoveries about the reality of this world that surrounds you.

The Pre-Alpha

The full game is still in development, but you can now play Pre-Alpha for free! This version includes the game's prologue, which takes place in the Deep Caves.

Highly recommended to use a controller to play.The game is in an early stage of development, technical issues are to be expected. Donate to support the development of this project!
